hero.title: Premium Industrial Footwear
hero.subtitle: Discover the perfect combination of safety, comfort, and style with HOOK. Designed for professionals who demand the best.

features.title: Why choose HOOK?
features.subtitle: Our footwear is designed to offer maximum protection without sacrificing style or comfort.

items.title: Superior Safety
items.description: Steel toe and resistant materials to protect you in any environment.

items.title: All-Day Comfort
items.description: Ergonomic design with padded support for long workdays.

items.title: Modern Style
items.description: Footwear that blends functionality with a sleek, contemporary design.

about.title: About HOOK
about.description: At HOOK, we believe industrial footwear should not only protect, but also inspire confidence. Our mission is to offer high-quality products, combining advanced technology with modern designs.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Provide high-performance apparel that combines design, comfort, and status, enhancing the work experience of professionals.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Become the leading brand of premium attire for professional environments, promoting physical and emotional well-being through design.
